sub_title: I guide you to raise the visibility of your CSR initiatives on LinkedIn ✨ Tips to boost your Corporate Volunteer Programs
summary:
At 29 years old, I quit my safe road!

With +7 years in the corporate world, I quit my job, a good salary and excellent benefits, still, without focus on my life purpose.

I embarked on an unknown and unsure road of countless personal and professional challenges, I migrated to another country!

I come from Latin America, exactly from Colombia, and I bring two suitcases 💼:

✨ One full of experiences, curiosity, skills and above all, a lot of humility.
🍃 Another one with many dreams and a strong life purpose, that only being out of my comfort zone I reaffirmed it.

During this time, I have to say that I have learned a lot and strengthened my skills to:

- Communicate clearly and strengthen brand positioning.
- Take off the digital presence of brands through LinkedIn.
- Create and lead volunteer programs.
- Manage Corporate Responsibility Reports.

From me, you will receive:

- A guide to polish your communications.
- Support in the creation and management of your Volunteer Program.
- Curiosity and humility throughout our journey.
- New knowledge that I put at your disposal.

🤓 PS: I am studying a Global Master in Sustainability and CSR, it means a step forward in my life purpose.

If you want to add more brightness to your CSR and Sustainability communications or create/boost your Volunteer Program, connect with me:

📧 Send me a direct message on LinkedIn | Via email: kelly.torresb1@gmail.com

awards.title: 2021 Global Communications Awards: Brand and Reputation Advancement
awards.description: Premio otorgado por el trabajo realizado en el aumento de la conciencia positiva de las partes interesadas externas sobre Baxter, nuestras iniciativas de innovación, la perspicacia digital y los esfuerzos de RSC/ESG.

profile_positions.description: I guide leaders and companies to raise CSR and ESG visibility, increase differentiation DNA, build reputational capital and trust.
profile_positions.title: Strategic Advisor In Sustainability Communication

profile_positions.description:
Highlight: :Defined the Corporate Responsibility and Sustainability strategy for Baxter Colombia, starting with the creation of the roadmap and the establishment of the first Sustainability Committee, defining key projects and the roles of each committee member.

Key Responsibilities:
Managed the CSR Report for Baxter Colombia. 
Oversight of WASH program in La Guajira - Colombia (Baxter International Foundation & UNICEF).
Communications management in Colombia, Chile and Ecuador for the integration of two businesses (Baxter + Hillrom).
Global collaborative work in a project to define the competencies of the Communications area worldwide.
Led and managed the internal and external communications strategy (Colombia, Cluster). Leader of the Communications team in the company. 
Reference in the development of graphic pieces for all that is required for the Employer Brand strategy in Cluster Colombia and LATAM.
Member of the Communications Committee of the National Association of Colombian Businessmen (ANDI) and the Council of American Companies (CEA).
profile_positions.title: Communications Specialist and Corporate Responsibility Leader

profile_positions.description:
Highlight  Management of the first social network (LinkedIn) for the company in Colombia. Profile with the fastest growth after the company's global profile in an organic way, through a clear strategy we were able to strengthen connections with institutions, clients and our collaborators. Strategy obtained global internal award*.

Achievements
Created Baxter's first Volunteer Program for Latin America.
Executed Baxter Colombia's first Corporate Responsibility Report, and managed it in the following years.
Managed the 65th Anniversary celebration event with a 360° communications and public relations strategy and impeccable execution.
Designed and executed internal communications plan in the midst of the COVID-19 pandemic to safeguard employee connection and engagement.
Defined the roadmap for the General Manager's corporate communications internally and externally in Colombia, Ecuador and Chile.
Supported in the crisis management of the National Strike in Colombia 2021.
Led and managed the internal and external communications strategy (Colombia, Cluster). Leader of the Communications team in the company. 
Contributed to and managed transversal Communications and Culture campaigns in Latin America.
*Award: 2021 Global Communications Awards - Brand and Reputation Advancement.
profile_positions.title: Sr, Analyst, Communications and Corporate Volunteer Leader

profile_positions.description:
Highlight: Successfully adapted, implemented and launched website for multinational pharmaceutical company, in collaboration with the global team in charge of interface development.

Achievements
Supported the management of internal communication plans for four countries in Latin America and one in the United States.
Designed graphic materials for communications, culture and wellness campaigns.
Management of communication channels: newsletters, digital and physical billboards, e-mail, intranet, etc.
profile_positions.title: Communications Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Highlight: Support in the execution and deployment of the communication plan of the new business and cultural strategy of the company*.

Achievements:
All corporate communication content structuring and alignment at the internal level (Strategy and design). 

Award: 2016 Global Communications Awards - Employee Engagement
profile_positions.title: Communications Analyst

profile_positions.description: Apoyo en la estructuración y ejecución de campañas de comunicación interna (plan de trabajo, estrategia, concepto, diseño y ejecución), a nivel local (Cali), nacional (Colombia) y regional (Latinoamérica – Ecuador, Chile y Argentina). Administración de la intranet y de la página web corporativa. Diseño de piezas de comunicación interna (boletines, emailings, afiches, logos, entre otros).
profile_positions.title: Practicante de comunicaciones

profile_positions.description: Apertura de nuevos clientes, creación de base de datos, seguimiento a clientes existentes, cobro de cartera, capacitaciones, impulso en el punto de venta, protocolo e imagen.
profile_positions.title: Representante de ventas en Cali

volunteer_experiences.description: I guide the Founder and CEO of a corporation to initiate its immersion on LinkedIn and increase its visibility by becoming a reference in eco-social restoration, and thus, attract investment to the projects.

Participo en el seguimiento al proyecto de compensación entre Baxter y ECOVIDA para la restauración y conservación de bosques seco tropical y de niebla en el Valle del Cauca. Adicionalmente, convoco a voluntarios corporativos para unirse a las siembras y entrega de regalos en temporadas navideñas.

Participo actualmente en el seguimiento a la alianza entre Baxter y UNICEF para llevar agua potable a la Guajira colombiana, además, planteando y coordinando opciones para actividades de voluntariado para los colaboradores en la zona costa del país.

Lidero el Programa de Voluntariado de Baxter Colombia, Chile y Ecuador donde contamos con alrededor de 11 fundaciones aliadas que nos permite generar una diferencia significativa desde lo social, ambiental y económico. Siempre nos alineamos para que nuestras acciones se conviertan en un avance por cumplir con los Objetivos de Desarrollo Sostenible (ODS). Adicionalmente, coordino el equipo de líderes de voluntariado en América Latina para Baxter y RCS, buscando sinergias y buenas prácticas aplicables en los diferentes países donde tenemos presencia.

volunteer_experiences.role: Miembro de la Mesa de Voluntariado de la ANDI

company.name: ANDI - Asociación Nacional de Empresarios de Colombia

volunteer_experiences.description: Hago parte de la Mesa de Voluntariado de la ANDI Seccional Valle del Cauca, donde se coordinan actividades que tienen impacto, principalmente en el Valle del Cauca, en categorías como lo social y medioambiental. Aquí trabajamos en proyectos que apuntan a la restauración de bosques, cambio de hábitos en el manejo de residuos en los hogares y parques públicos, y apoyo a mujeres cabeza de hogar a potenciar sus habilidades blandas y duras.

Participé en la maratón para recaudar fondos para sillas de ruedas e insumos para la fundación que atiende a niñ@s con capacidades especiales en la ciudad de Cali.

Logistica de actividades navideñas para entrega de regalos a los niñ@s en situación de vulnerabilidad.

skills: Relaciones con los medios de comunicación
